import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update app model details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/{ModelId}/link/app/{AppId}/details"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the configuration details for a model-app link.

**Prerequisites**
- **ModelId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/models/search-models)
- **AppId** - Application identifier string

**Configurable Options**
- `InheritIssues` - Whether the model inherits issues from the app

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}/link/app/\{AppId\}/details](/docs/api/models/get-app-model-details) - View current details

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ModelId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the model.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].ModelId"}},{"name":"AppId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Application identifier string.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Configuration for a model-application link","properties":{"AppId":{"type":"string","description":"Application identifier"},"ModelId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Model identifier"},"InheritIssues":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model inherits issues from the app","default":false}},"required":["AppId","ModelId"],"title":"AppModel"},"example":{"AppId":"google-admin","ModelId":"8b7f9421-1b0a-4dd4-d7c7-498f1954f69a","InheritIssues":true}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
